hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu 'Abdur-Rahman Al-Hubuli that he heard Abu Ayyub Al-Ansari say:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Going out before noon and after noon, in the cause of Allah, is better than everything on which the sun rises and sets

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الرَّوْحَةِ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ .
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of Going Out After Noon In The Cause Of Allah, The Mighty And Sublime
